00029 class GenericCli {

00031   public:
00032 
00044     template <class ApiFunc>
00045       int run(ApiFunc function, std::string dietConfig, int ac, char*  av[]) {
00046 
00047         try{
00048 
00049           // initializing DIET
00050 
00051           if (vishnuInitialize(const_cast<char*>(dietConfig.c_str()), ac, av)) {
00052 
00053             errorUsage(av[0],dietErrorMsg,EXECERROR);
00054 
00055             return  ERRCODE_CLI_ERROR_DIET ;
00056           }
00057 
00058           // get the sessionKey
00059           std::string sessionKey=getLastSessionKey(getppid());
00060 
00061           // DIET call 
00062           if(false==sessionKey.empty()){
00063             printSessionKeyMessage();
00064             
00065             //call of the api fuction
00066             int ret =function(sessionKey);
00067 
00068             if (VISHNU_OK == ret){
00069             printSuccessMessage();
00070             } 
00071             return ret;
00072 
00073           }
00074           errorUsage(av[0],"cannot retrieve sessionKey");
00075 
00076         } catch(VishnuException& e){// catch all Vishnu runtime error
00077           std::string  msg = e.getMsg()+" ["+e.getMsgComp()+"]";
00078           errorUsage(av[0], msg,EXECERROR);
00079           //check the bad session key
00080           if (checkBadSessionKeyError(e)){
00081             removeBadSessionKeyFromFile(getppid());
00082           }
00083           return e.getMsgI() ;
00084         } catch(std::exception& e){// catch all std runtime error
00085           errorUsage(av[0],e.what());
00086           return ERRCODE_CLI_ERROR_RUNTIME;
00087         }
00088 
00089       }
00090 
00102     template <class ApiFunc>
00103       int runWithoutSessionKey(ApiFunc function, std::string dietConfig, int ac, char*  av[]) {
00104 
00105         try{
00106 
00107           // initializing DIET
00108 
00109           if (vishnuInitialize(const_cast<char*>(dietConfig.c_str()), ac, av)) {
00110 
00111             errorUsage(av[0],dietErrorMsg,EXECERROR);
00112 
00113             return  ERRCODE_CLI_ERROR_DIET ;
00114           }
00115 
00116           //call of the api fuction
00117           int ret =function();
00118 
00119           if (VISHNU_OK == ret) {
00120             printSuccessMessage(); 
00121         }
00122         return ret;
00123 
00124         } catch(VishnuException& e){// catch all Vishnu runtime error
00125           std::string  msg = e.getMsg()+" ["+e.getMsgComp()+"]";
00126           errorUsage(av[0], msg,EXECERROR);
00127           return e.getMsgI() ;
00128         } catch(std::exception& e){// catch all std runtime error
00129           errorUsage(av[0],e.what());
00130           return ERRCODE_CLI_ERROR_RUNTIME;
00131         }
00132 
00133       }

00144     void processListOpt(const boost::shared_ptr<Options>& opt, bool& isEmpty, int ac, char*  av[], 
00145         const std::string& signature=std::string()) {
00146 
00147       CLICmd cmd = CLICmd (ac, av, opt);
00148       try {
00149         opt->parse_cli(ac,av);
00150 
00151         isEmpty=opt->empty();//if no value was given in the command line
00152         // Parse the cli and setting the options found
00153         int ret = cmd.parse(env_name_mapper());
00154 
00155         if (ret != VISHNU_OK){
00156           helpUsage(*opt,"[option] "+signature);
00157           exit(ret);
00158         }
00159 
00160         // PreProcess (adapt some parameters if necessary)
00161         checkVishnuConfig(*opt);
00162         if ( opt->count("help")){
00163           helpUsage(*opt,"[option] "+signature);
00164           exit(VISHNU_OK);
00165         }
00166 
00167       }
00168       catch(po::error& e){ // catch all other bad parameter errors
00169         helpUsage(*opt,"[option] "+signature);
00170         exit(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM);
00171       }
00172       catch(std::exception& e){// catch all std runtime error
00173         errorUsage(av[0],e.what());
00174         exit(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM);
00175       }
00176 
00177     }
00178 };
